lyrics.l: Well, worry, worry, worry, baby, worry's all I can do
Well, worry, worry, worry, woman, worry's all I can do

Yes, my life is so miserable, baby, woman, it is all on account of
you
Yes, it hurts me, it hurts me so bad, when you said we were through
Yes, it hurts me, it hurts me so bad, woman. when you said, when you said we were through
Yes, uh, you know I'd rather be dead, woman, woman than to be here lonesome and blue
Goodbye, baby, oh, you know I sure had a wonderful time
Oh, goodbye, goodbye, goodbye, goodbye, goodbye babe
Lord, have mercy, Lord, have mercy, we sure had a wonderful time
You know you're gonna run me crazy, darlin' are you gonna make me
